title: Engagement Opportunities | Engineering Career Center | University of Illinois at Chicago
text: Ignite a Career. Engineer the Future.
Thank you for thinking of UIC engineering students! We look forward to working with you.

As your partner in maximizing engineering recruitment and branding opportunities, we are your resource to help make your company a top choice for UIC College of Engineering students. Our staff consists of professionals with various backgrounds in business, higher education and recruitment. We want to make it easy for you to have access to UIC's population of more than 5,000 engineering students.

As a result of the COVID-19 pandemic: we are pivoting many of our traditional on-campus activities and events to virtual formats. We expect to conduct most recruitment events and on-campus interviews virtually for the Fall 2020 semester. We will be updating this website frequently as the state of Illinois releases social distancing policies and guidelines.
Check out the engagement opportunities below and contact us anytime for help arranging your recruitment event.

“We had such a positive experience working with your Engineering Career Center. You were able to assist us in spreading the word about an entry level opportunity we had for a Mechanical Engineer to your graduates and we immediately had highly qualified candidates contact us who had the right credentials our client needed. We were able to successfully place one graduate within only a couple of weeks and hope to place the other candidates soon. We can’t thank you enough for your efforts and hope this is just the beginning of a mutually beneficial partnership!”
